intro: Beilschmiedia tirunelvelica, commonly known as the Tirunelveli beilschmiedia, is a species of flowering plant in the family Lauraceae. Native to the Western Ghats of India, it is characterized by its evergreen foliage and small, fragrant flowers. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded habitats within tropical forests. It has elliptical to ovate leaves with a smooth surface and a glossy appearance. The fruit is a small, dark-colored drupe that contains a single seed.
